articles.author: Nick Ames
articles.title: Chelsea’s Graham Potter hails ‘special night’ after victory over Dortmund - The Guardian
articles.description: Graham Potter said: ‘The players have been suffering; today was important,’ while Borussia Dortmund’s Jude Bellingham was unhappy at the retaken penalty
articles.content: A relieved Graham Potter hailed a special night after his Chelsea side reached the Champions League quarter-finals with a 2-0 win against Borussia Dortmund, bringing up successive victories during a … [+3158 chars]
